headline: S&P 500 Gains and Losses Today: Robinhood and Western Digital Surge; Vistra Stock Slides
summary: Shares of an online brokerage platform jumped on Monday, Sept. 19, 2025, while a utility company's stock lost ground after a major contract announcement.

headline: Robinhood Stock Gets a Prediction Market Boost
summary: It was another good day for Robinhood Markets. The online brokerage firm's stock climbed 12% to an all-time high Monday. This year, it has more than tripled in price. Chief executive Vlad Tenev said in a social media post this morning that more than four billion event contracts have been traded on Robinhood’s platform since the company started offering the product.

headline: Hot Stocks Keep Rising, Despite Potential Government Shutdown
summary: Stock indexes posted modest gains, while Robinhood Markets, AppLovin and Coinbase—shares favored by individual investors—stood out. The S&P 500 rose 0.3%.

raw.headline: Hot Stocks Keep Rising, Despite Potential Government Shutdown

headline: Robinhood Shares Climb 12% on Growth in Prediction-Market Trades
summary: The executive said in a post on X on Monday that Robinhood customers have now transacted more than 4 billion of such event contracts, 2 billion of which were in the third quarter alone.  Betting on prediction markets came to prominence during the 2024 US presidential election, when platforms such as Kalshi and Polymarket facilitated millions of dollars in wagers on the outcome.  Robinhood has seen it as a source of growth and the proliferation is blurring the lines between financial markets and the gambling industry.

headline: Why Is Robinhood (HOOD) Stock Rocketing Higher Today
summary: Shares of financial services company Robinhood (NASDAQ:HOOD) jumped 9% in the afternoon session after the stock hit a new all-time high of $132 amid a confluence of positive catalysts, including robust business growth and multiple analyst price target upgrades.
